theme.description: Bloomreach needs to integrate into your theme to handle search on your store. Read more in our

primaryAction.label: Add Bloomreach Configurations Embed Block
primaryAction.description: To enable Bloomreach and Autosuggest on your theme, click on the button below. This will add Bloomreach to your theme and will allow you to customize the autosuggest experience.

template.title: Template
template.description: Configure the template for displaying your autosuggests powered by Bloomreach API's
